## CartState enum

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum CartState 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Active | <code>&quot;Active&quot;</code> | The cart can be updated and ordered. It is the default state. |
|  Merged | <code>&quot;Merged&quot;</code> | Anonymous cart whose content was merged into a customers cart on signin. No further operations on the cart are allowed. |
|  Ordered | <code>&quot;Ordered&quot;</code> | The cart was ordered. No further operations on the cart are allowed. |
